events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request was reviewed and categorized under the refund cluster due to the nature of the complaint.
Support agent Julia has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, I need a photo of the received product and the order ID to verify the transaction.
Here is the order number 12345 and attached is the photo showing that I received the wrong item instead of what I ordered.
We have verified your order details. We will process a full refund within 3-5 business days and provide a return shipping label shortly.
Thank you for the quick reply and the refund process details. I’m relieved this will be handled promptly.
Your refund is now processed and you will receive an email confirmation shortly. Please let us know if you need anything else.
We are following up to confirm that you received your refund and the return shipment label. Please reach out if there are any further issues.
This case has been closed as the refund was completed successfully and all customer concerns were addressed.
